reviews.title: Great for classroom pencil holders!!
reviews.text: I just got these, after failed attempts with dollar store pencil holders. These are sturdy, and  can hold a marker, Expo, and 2 pencils!! I will update if they break, but they seem very sturdy!! I would recommend them to all my teaching friends. If they can stand up to second graders, they will stand up to anyone needing these for travel!

reviews.title: I bought these for my double point knitting needlseT
reviews.text:
These are as promised, they come individually wrapped and are clean and free of manufacturing grease.
I am not using them for the intended purpose but they are great for storing my sets of dp needles. I can find the size I want immediately and they don't spread themselves all over the drawer where they're kept any longer.
They seem to stay together very well, I can recommend them for this purpose with no reserve.

reviews.title: Great to use as pencil holders!
reviews.text: I am using these as pencil holders for my students. They are working great so far!

reviews.title: Hi
reviews.text: There bad ass I like this

reviews.title: Bought for classroom
reviews.text: I use these in my classroom for pencils. Unfortunately about 4 have broken at this point just from regular wear and tear. They are probably good for travel, but don’t withstand 4th grade usage.

title: TEETHEORY Electric Toothbrush, 8 Brush Heads Sonic Electric Toothbrush with 40000 VPM Deep Clean 5 Modes, Rechargeable Toothbrushes Fast Charge (with Travel Case, Pink and Black)
features: 40000VPM HIGH VIBRATION - 2 pack sonic electric toothbrush equipped with World-leading Powered Motor to generate 40,000 STROKES per minute, and thus dissolve deep tooth dirt effectively. 10X Cleaning Effect than manual toothbrush and 3X than ordinary electric toothbrush. 7 DAYS to Whiten teeth & 14 DAYS for Healthier Teeth.

12 x 3D DUPONT BRUSH HEADS & 2 TRAVEL CASES - 2 pack electric toothbrush comes with 12 brush heads designed by DuPont company; a world leader in quality and material science field. Each brush head lasts up to 3 months, absolutely the ideal choise for all of you! 2 different color hard shell travel cases made of the latest technology materials, can hold 1 brush head. It's very suitable for travel or business trip.

5 MODES & POWER REMINDER - 2 pack sonic electric toothbrush for adult supports 5 modes: whitening, cleaning, sensitive, polishing, massage. Whitening mode fulfilled by reversing the frequency to dissolve the surface stains. And massage modes deliver smooth microbursts to the tissue to improve blood circulation and gum health. Electric toothbrush 2 pack have remaining power knowable after each use. Never worry for sudden power off.

PERFECT PARTNER FOR TRIP - Last for 30 DAYS after only 4 hours full charging(2mins/2 times per day). The 2 pack sonic toothbrush come with a USB charging cable for charging anywhere. Weighs just 55g, less than half of ordinary sonic toothbrushes. IPX7 waterproof for easy water rinsing after each use.

PACKAGE - 2 pack sonic electric toothbrush, 12 DuPont toothbrush heads, 2 travel cases, 2 USB charging cables, 1 User manual. Ideal GIFT CHOICE for family & friends. More than 2 million enthusiastic users around the world feel excellent of using sonic toothbrush to improve gum health and whiten teeth. family is looking forward to your joining!

reviews.title: Good quality product.
reviews.text: Haven't had it long, however, I like the way my teeth feel after brushing.  Light touch buy effective cleaning. I have been a customer of Phillips Sonic for at least 26 years.  At my last dental cleaning, my hygienist also recommends Sonic.

reviews.title: More like the impossible-to-find-Fairywill
reviews.text: This replaces a previously-ordered wireless-charging brush.  Reason for this is that it's lighter, takes a common brushhead (and we have the soft-bristle heads from previously).  Has a plug-in charger, i.e. not wireless, so that works, easy to travel with, don't have to take an induction charger with us. Also, the 30-second indicator is easy to hear/feel.

reviews.title: I like it but room for improvement
reviews.text: It is a great product the reason l gave it a 3 star is l would prefer the brush to spin it just vibrates so l still have to brush and that damages the gums so not happy about that otherwise it holds a battery for at least 3 months or more before the next charge and is a powerful vibration but l will see what my dentist says when l do in on Wednesday after my 6 week check up from having a deep cleaning

It gives you that DENTIST CLEANING FEEL with our patented Harmonic Resonance technology moving at over 40,000 strokes per minute, making it the "World's Fastest Toothbrush" with each scientifically designed attachement vibrating at a specific frequency for the perfect cleaning every time. It gives you a LONG LASTING CHARGE that allows up to 1-2 weeks of usage with a fully charged brush, giving you the convenient option of leaving the charging base at home when you travel for the weekend, along with a CLEVERLY DESIGNED CHARGING BASE measures 3 inches in diameter with a detachable accessory holder, so it won't take up much needed counter space. We back our quality with our promise which is 100% SATISFACTION, with a 30 day money back guarantee no questions asked, along with 1 full year manufacturer's warranty.

reviews.title: Best toothbrush
reviews.text: This is my second cybersonic toothbrush.  When my first cybersonic failed after many years of good service I ordered a less expensive name brand electric toothbrush and after 6 weeks threw it away and ordered my new cybersonic. Lesson learned.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.text:
I've been using Cybersonic for decades. My teeth don't feel clean without it.
My second handle/rechargable battery needed replacing, so I decided to try the Cybersonic 3. I was surprised how much lighter it feels. And I think the oscillation is faster, but I didn't read up on it to check. Same great result - really clean teeth. The timing indicator isn't something I wanted/needed, but doesn't bother me. I has basically ignore it. Hope this handle lasts as long as my previous ones.
I really like the charging base. I discarded the side attachments to hold extra brushes and accessories, which left me with a sleek, minimalistic charging base.
So far I'm really happy with my purchase & highly recommend this product/brand/company.

reviews.title: Simply the best.
reviews.text: A system approach to oral hygiene that works for me, and the best oral health care product of its kind available. PERIOD!

features: 【LOVELY CARTOON DESIGN TO ENHANCE THE FUN OF BRUSHING TEETH】 The cute cartoon design make this lovely automatic toothbrush attractive to all kids, they are excited to brush the teeth with this funny toothbrush, easy and fun for little brusher ages 3 and up. This help your kids be willing to brush teeth longer even develop healthy brushing habits.

【IPX7 WATERPROOF】IPX7 waterproof sealing design is adopted, and babies can also use it when bathing. The product can be placed in a water depth of 1 meter and soaked for 15 minutes, and the product is still in normal use without being damaged.

【FAST CHARGING】 The ultrasonic toothbrush is equipped with fast charging cable, which can be discharged and charged instantly. The LED lights on when USB charging is connected, and it only needs to be charged for 3 hours and can be used for 1 week. Safe, fast and convenient, easy to use at home or travel.

【UNIQUE U-SHAPED DESIGN】 Ergonomic U-shaped brush head, suitable for the shape and mechanics of children's teeth structure. Soft pacifier grade silicone, soft brim around the teeth 360 degrees, providing a comfortable feeling of brushing, the original V-shaped cleaning path, effective deep cleaning, will not harm the gums, protect children's enamel.

【MULTIFUNCTIONAL MODE】Our automatic toothbrush can promote the health of gums and teeth through different functional modes : 1. Strong mode for powerful teeth brushing; 2. Medium mode for comfortable teeth brushing; 3. Massage mode for gum massage.50 secs scientific timing for each brushing, it stops automatically, Parents don’t have to face to face to urge children to brush their teeth.

reviews.title: It came off
reviews.text: My daughter pull off the rubber part that it attached to the metal part. I have no idea if it was supposed to do that. She can still use it but I to help her get it out of her mouth at times. I need to see if I can have it exchanged for a new one. Its a lot easier to get her to brush her teeth she likes it and she is 4

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.text: My eldest has a difficult time with the sensation of anything against his gums.  This results in nasty plaque.  I was hopeful that this would be a solution but it's not.  Expensive let down.

reviews.title: Worked great for 3 months
reviews.text: Worked great for 3 months. Then stopped working even though it was fully charged.

reviews.title: Good 4 Already Clean Kid Teeth
reviews.text:
Very easy and fun for toddlers who are learning to brush their teeth. Definitely must swish back and forth, for any actual cleaning to take place.

Wouldn't recommend for children with chronic oral hygiene issues. The bristles on this brush are not meant for heavy cleaning.

reviews.title: Love these
reviews.text: My kids absolutely love these. The brush their teeth everyday without a fight. I love them they are small perfect for kid hands and super easy to use.

reviews.title: Arrived on time, in good shape.
reviews.text: I love the toothbrushes.

reviews.title: Soft bristles are gentle on gums!
reviews.text: I loved Woobamboo! before, but this time bought the extra-soft bristled toothbrushes. They are wonderful! I'm a senior citizen, so a lot of toothbrushes are just too rough on my old gums. These gently clean my teeth, and an added bonus of being biodegradable. Made by a responsible company and affordable!

reviews.title: The flavor is WRONG, too expensive. Don’t buy!
reviews.text: The flavor is WRONG. bought this for ridiculous markup because we’ve been looking for bubble berry. NOT the same as description or picture. Flavor is bubble fruit, which my kids hate. This is double the money of just buying the toothbrush and paste separately. I wish I read more reviews. DONT BUY.

title: Better & Better Bamboo Sonic Toothbrush for Adults | Rechargeable Electric Toothbrush | Replaceable Bamboo Brush Heads w/Soft, Plant-Based Bristles | 5 Cleaning Modes & Long-Lasting Battery
features: A Cleaner Clean and Brighter, Whiter Smile - Improve your brushing routine with Better & Better’s Bamboo Sonic Toothbrush for adults equipped with soft, natural, plant-based bristles made from castor bean oil. Our sonic toothbrush produces up to 38,000 microvibrations per minute for high polish and gentle clean. Choose from its 5 cleaning modes depending on your brushing needs.

Smart, Seamless & More Powerful Cleaning - Our bamboo electric toothbrush for adults features a 2-minute dentist-recommended timer with 30-second interval pulses. Flaunt your unique smile with the help of the sonic toothbrush's 5 cleaning modes: cleaning (default) for removing plaque, whitening for improving surface color, polishing mode for brightening your front teeth, milder for gentle gum massage, and sensitive for a super gentle mode for sensitive teeth and gums.

A Better Brushing Routine - The bamboo sonic toothbrush’s cleaning modes and plant-based bristles are safe to use on braces and dental restorations (fillings, crowns, veneers, or implants). Our electric toothbrush for adults is certified cruelty-free and comes in recyclable packaging.

Designed for Optimal Brushing Experience - Our bamboo electric sonic brush comes with replaceable bamboo heads. The entire brush is waterproof, so you can use it in the shower. The long-lasting and rechargeable battery also makes this the perfect travel toothbrush to keep your routine tip top on the go. You only need to charge it every 30-40 days when your routine consists of brushing twice, morning and night.

Better for You. Better for the Planet - We set out to make toothbrushes that are good in every way. Our unique natural bamboo brush heads create less waste when replaced. We prioritize the health of our bodies and our planet, which leads us to imagine entirely new ways of doing things. And as we minimize the ecological effects of our products and packaging, we create a better world.

reviews.title: Best toothbrush ever.
reviews.text:
I’ve used Sonicare Diamondclean for years - but after trying this one, I’ll never go back. It’s gentler, cleans better, and less than half the price of Diamondclean. I love the bamboo, the soft bristles. The only thing I wish it had two buttons (one for on/off, one for the settings), and a wireless induction charging base.
But as is I still love it.

reviews.title: Bamboo sonic toothbrush
reviews.text:
Good, sonic (vibrations rather than spinning) toothbrush. I am sure it helps clean better than a manual one, but I would prefer a spinning head for myself. It comes with only 2 replacement heads which deducts a star as I expect at least 4. It does comes with a toothbrush holder stand to recharge with a 30-40 day battery life. Many of these brushes only come with a ubs cable, so the included toothbrush holder is a great addition. Has a 2 minute timer as well as 5 cleaning modes. This toothbrush is unique as it is made with bamboo making it a more natural product!

Amazon will donate to your favorite charity! Use Amazon Smile (smile.amazon.com) when you order and Amazon will donate to the charity of your choice when you make a qualifying purchase. Check out how Amazon Smile works at https://smile.amazon.com/gp/chpf/about/ref=smi_se_rspo_laas_aas. My shopping is donating to my charity of choice; Unravel, at no cost to me! Unravel is a nonprofit organization working to spread knowledge about the grim realities of pediatric cancer and the devastating impact from the lack of funding. All monies raised by and for Unravel will go directly to the fight against pediatric cancer.

title: Pyhralke Schallcare Replacement Brush Heads Fit for Braun Oral b, Precision Heads Compatible with Oral-B Pro1000/9600/5000/3000/1500/Genius and Smart Electric Toothbrush(4pcs)
features: Compatible with Oral-B , Deep Sweep, SmartSeries, ProSeries, Triumph, Advance Power, ProfessionalCare, ProfessionalCare SmartSeries, Vitality Floss Action, Vitality Dual Clean, Vitality CrossAction, Vitality Precision Clean, Vitality Pro White, Vitality Sensitive, Vitality TriZone.(Attention: DO NOT compatible with oral b io)

Schallcare brush heads, the bristles with bacterial protective function, which can prevent bacterial growth on the brush. Also with strong cleaning function, which can removes up to 3x more plaque along the gum line than a traditional manual toothbrush.

Safe, healthy, and durable. Made with soft and flexible DuPont bristles and approved to meet official dental health and safety standards. At the same time, the production of brush heads uses a unique process technique, which greatly enhances the durability of the toothbrush head.

The slightly longer bristles at both ends are designed to easily clean the oral blind area--every side of the innermost teeth, also clean the gap of teeth, for comprehensive cleaning, fresh breath, prevention of tooth decay.

The soft to middle bristles protect teeth from harmful hard brushes and offer a more comfortable cleaning, better for your teeth and gum health. Side-to-side bristles sweep away plaque while the moving power tip penetrates hard to reach areas and fixed filaments help to whiten the enamel, reaching the most difficult areas.

reviews.title: Good, but take a bit to soften
reviews.text: The first time I used these they made my gums bleed. It takes a bit for the bristles to soften up. The bristles also tend to look a bit frayed after a few weeks which definitely doesn’t happen with the name brand ones.

reviews.title: Every bit as good as the ones made by Oral-B
reviews.text:
I've been using Oral-B electric toothbrushes for 15-20 years and have always purchased replacement brushes made by them. This time I decided to see if I could save some money and give these a try, and I'm very glad that I did.

The only difference I can see between the Schallcare ones and the ones sold under the Oral-B Sensitive Care label is that these fit tighter, which results in a surprisingly large reduction in the noise level, and of course they only cost 1/3 as much. I've been using one the Schallcare brushes for about 6 weeks now and it shows absolutely no wear, so I think there's a good chance they will last every bit as long as the Oral-B brand ones.

reviews.title: Soft for gums and tiny teeth.
reviews.text: Cute little tooth brush for babies to learn with. Not going to hurt gums if they start to chew on it. Can see a two year old learning to brush well after tries as a baby with this safe brush.

reviews.title: Love the design
reviews.text: Its so cute and the bristles are soft so its perfect for a toddler.

reviews.title: Great size...
reviews.text: These toothbrushes are the perfect size for toddlers.  The bristles are soft and the handle is made of a combination of hard plastic and silicone, so it’s easy to grip.  The optional silicone guard is perfect for helping little ones learn how to control the brush.  And, each brush has a suction cup on the end of the handle, so it’s easy to stand them up in the bathroom counter.  My only issue is that one of the brushes got smashed during delivery and the silicone guard is bent inwards...it will probably pop out in time, so really only a minor issue.  Overall, nice infant to toddler toothbrushes!

reviews.title: One of my favorite toddler toothbrushes
reviews.text: I really love how theses have the guards. My nephew has special needs so while he's 8, he physically is like an infant. We are teaching him how to hold a toothbrush and brush his own teeth. This is great because he always puts too much in his mouth and ends up choking. If you have a new leader to brushing teeth this is most definitely will be your saving grace.

This toothbrush designed ergonomically with short handle, it is safe and easy to use for toddlers and children, and highly effective to store the oral health of you and your love ones. reviews.title: Amazing!

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.text: Exactly what I expected! Incredibly soft. I bought this to brush my cat's teeth because he's very sensitive and normal cat toothbrushes hurt him. He likes this one.

reviews.title: Dog Friendly
reviews.text: I like this toothbrush. My granddog hates having his teeth brushed. The other brushes hurt his gum tissue because he moves so much. He is much calmer when I use this brush.  Good buy

reviews.title: Love this!

title: Initio Sonic Electric Toothbrush for Adults Rechargeable Toothbrush with Smart Timer 5 Modes 3 Brush Heads 40,000 VPM Motor Whitening Power Toothbrush IT959 (Navy Blue)
features: [5 High-Performance Brushing Modes] Electric toothbrush with 5 modes of intelligence for adults and kids,including White, Clean, Sensitive, Polish, Massage to suit different conditions of teeth of gums. You can choose different modes for your electric toothbrush according to your gum conditions and preferences. Initio sonic electric toothbrush is also a perfect Valentine's Day gift.

[Powerful Sonic Cleaning Effect] This electric toothbrush with the latest sonic technology delivers 40,000 strokes per minute.The sonic technology allows the fluid to gently clean between the teeth and the gum line, the Initio electric toothbrush cleaning effect is 10 times that of manual toothbrushes and 3 times that of ordinary electric toothbrushes. People who smoke or drink tea all the year round can also get brighter teeth by sticking with this electric toothbrush.

[2 Minutes Smart Timer] The electric toothbrush built in smart timer control,pause every 30 seconds to remind the user to change the cleaning area. 2 minutes auto shut off as the brush time recommend by dentist. The rechargeable electric toothbrush can let you get the sweetest smile in the shortest time.

[IPX7 Waterproof and Light Weight Design] Rechargeable electric toothbrush with IPX7 rated waterproof design, so you can safely use the electric toothbrush in the bath or shower. No worry about the water would enter the charge ports to short the battery life. Also,when in use this electric toothbrush, you can feel the comfort and lightness and experience the details of the electric toothbrush design.

[Full Charging for 45 Days Using] This Sonic Electric Toothbrush can run for 45 days after eight hours of charging.The lightweight body design and USB charging interface make this electric toothbrush the best choice for travel-portable and convenient. Great for carrying and traveling. Also one of the best choices as a gift. Please kindly know that the package DO NOT include the AC Adaptor.

reviews.title: Broke after 1yr
reviews.text: I purchased this toothbrush from another seller/company who is no longer selling this product. As you can see, the neck broke after about 1yr of usage.

reviews.title: Great Electric Toothbrush
reviews.text: Very happy with this Sonic electric toothbrush. I like all the different speeds. Very simple and quick to charge and would be easy to travel with and charge. Nice snap cover for the brush making it easier to pack the brush for travel.  Timer mode works great encouraging me not to be in such a hurry brushing my teeth.

reviews.title: Lightweight brush that packs a punch
reviews.text:
What I like:

-lightweight and compact in size
-only one button to cycle through modes and turn it off
-comes with (3) brush heads
-includes USB power cord
-will fit in my toothbrush holder

What I don't like:

-need to buy power adapter to charge it

This isn't a fancy sonic toothbrush. If you're looking for a basic electric toothbrush that's a step above the type you'd buy at the grocery store (that takes two AA batteries - you know the one), this will do it. The toothbrush cleaned my teeth well with a good amount of vibration of the bristles. I'm pretty pleased.

reviews.title: Toothbrush
reviews.text: [[VIDEOID:fa007684a8fa5379afdcdb30ceda64f4]] At first I couldn’t get over the vibration, but after using it a couple times I couldn’t get over how polished & white my teeth were! This toothbrush has become top tier in my dental hygiene. 10/10

reviews.title: 5 Different modes
reviews.text: Works really well. It does feel weird since I’m not so used to using an electric toothbrush. Very convenient that it comes with 3 brush heads & usb cable

title: Toothbrush Marker by CUPmarker - Set of 6 Reusable & Adjustable Toothbrush Labels for Standard Toothbrushes
description: Set of six (6) toothbrush markers by CUPmarker in assorted colors. No more mix-ups! Pick a color and slide it on to your toothbrush to make your toothbrush uniquely identifiable. These reusable toothbrush markers help to label and personalize toothbrushes of varying sizes.They are an excellent choice for home, travel, dorms and other group settings. Mix and match toothbrush markers to create a unique and personalized look or use individually.
features: Set of 6 toothbrush markers by CUPmarker (assorted colors).
Stretches to fit on toothbrush handles of varying sizes .
Our reusable toothbrush markers are made of food-safe materials.
Low-profile minimalist label design offers excellent toothbrush grip and comfort.

reviews.title: Worked for my purpose
reviews.text: My husband and I share an electric toothbrush and usually the toothbrush heads come with different colors but sometimes we get stuck with all the same ones so I wanted something else to mark them. They were a little small to fit on the oral b toothbrush head but I managed to get them on.

title: Sonic Electric Toothbrush for Adults - 5 Powerful Cleaning & Whitening Modes with Soft Dupont Bristles, 2 Hours Quick Charge for 60 Days, IPX7 Waterproof Travel Portable Oral Dental Care Kit (Green)
features: 🦷【Smart Sonic Toothbrush】- Our electric toothbrush uses an ultra-powerful and industry-leading motor to drive the liquid between the teeth and deep into the gum line, effectively dissolving stains on the surface of the teeth. Provides superior cleaning by delivering soothing micro-pulses to improve gum health. Removes up to 10 times more plaque than a manual toothbrush, helps whiten teeth.

🦷【5 Modes Ultra Clean】- The sonic toothbrush has 5 vibration modes, clean (mild), white (strong), polish (strong inversion frequency), massage (mild inversion frequency) and sensitive (soft). You can choose stronger or lighter modes according to different oral and gum conditions. Get healthier gums, fresher breath and whiter teeth with this low-noise, lightweight sonic toothbrush.

🦷【Smart Timer Reminder】 - The electric toothbrush has a standard 2-minute brushing timer to ensure scientific brushing time. Pausing every 30 seconds to remind you to change and move on to the next brushing area, the smart toothbrush helps you develop good brushing habits. And the rechargeable toothbrush has an automatic memory function, which can record the mode used when it was turned off last time.

🦷【Large Battery Capacity, IPX7 Waterproof】- The long-life rechargeable toothbrush has a battery indicator light, has a low battery reminder and automatically cuts off the power when fully charged. The large battery capacity can be used for up to 60 days in just 2 hours with fast charging (2 times a day). The IPX7-rated fully sealed charging port is more secure and waterproof, and can be used in bathtubs and showers.

🦷【Gift Box Packaging Included】- Our electric toothbrush comes in a premium gift box packag. Includes 1 Sonic Electric Toothbrush, 2 DuPont Brush Heads, 1 Charging Cable, 1 Travel Case for Electric Toothbrush Handle and Brush Heads. You can also find detailed instructions and a support contact manual. Perfect as a gift for your family and friends.
🦷We provide you with 1 year warranty service. If you have any questions, please contact us first, we will provide you with satisfactory customer service within 24 hours.

reviews.title: Brush your teeth
reviews.text:
[[VIDEOID:3fb7df8324b736c48355f08468ae1f62]] You’ve got to brush those teeth. Make them all squeaky clean !

This seems like a standard electric toothbrush

I like the design and think it looks nice

It has a good feel to it overall and i thought the different settings were nice

reviews.title: Superior Brushing Experience
reviews.text: This electric toothbrush is the best I've ever used. It charged quickly and lasts. It is comfortable in my hands through the entire brushing process. It has average buzzing sound. There are multiple intensities of bruising power for different parts of my mouth. My teeth went from obvious coffee drinker to noticeably whiter and healthier. The bristles are gentle regardless of which setting I used. The narrow head allows me to easily brush my back teeth and gums.

reviews.title: Absolutly love this color
reviews.text: i have never had so many people fight over these!  great color and design!  never seen a green toothbrush and clearly noone else has either lol  works great!

travel case too

title: Etravel Travel Toothbrush Case And Cover - Luxury Toothbrush Holder, Portable Travel Organizer, Camping Supplies, Electric Toothbrush Case For Travel - 4 Colors [Navy]

reviews.title: Difficult to open.
reviews.text: Just returned this item. Trying to open this container is almost impossible. To open one has to turn it and pull. When doing this it makes a terrible squeaking noise. I don't understand why so many people gave this a good review when it is so bad.

reviews.title: Easily fits our 2 Sonicare bases w/the brushes
reviews.text:
It also splits into 2 cups which is a nice feature, so we don't have to use the glasses in the hotel room as we don't know how clean those glasses are. It's a nice weight of plastic, and the blue color is rich looking.

The price is a bit on the higher side, but it's very good quality.

All in all, I think this will be a very handy travel tool!

title: Kids Ultrasonic Electric Toothbrush, U Shaped Rechargeable Automatic Toothbrushes with Replacement Brush 6 Cleaning Mode Smart Timer 360° Sonic Dental Care for Ages 2-7 Child (Blue)
features: U-shaped Brush Head: Ninety percent of children aged 2-7 years refuse to brush their teeth. Our upgraded version of the electric toothbrush is designed with a astronaut pattern & U shaped brush head to stimulate children's interest in brushing teeth and develop kids healthy brushing habits. The package comes with a replacement toothbrush, and the u-brush is gentle on the gums and enamel.

6 Automatic Cleaning Modes: Kids electric toothbrushes with up to 5000-20000Hz sonic vibration per minute for comprehensive cleaning of teeth. Can choose from the strong mode for powerful teeth brushing, Comfortable mode, among others. All the different modes are timed to make brushing for kids easy.

IPX7 Waterproof: Toddler electric toothbrush has IPX7 waterproof sealing design, the entire toothbrush can be rinsed with water, it also can be used in the shower. The toothbrush head is removable and replaceable. You can crop as needed.

Rechargeable: Kids toothbrushes equipped with rechargeable battery, USB charging to support brushing for 7-10 days with just 2 hours charging; It is portable and rechargeable, fitting for home or travel use.

45s Smart Timer Control: the 45-second timer control function can educate children to brush their teeth at the recommended time, which can complete tooth cleaning more scientifically. If you have any problems about toothbrush, please contact us by email.

reviews.title: Toddler loves this.
reviews.text: We use this to help brushing teeth during the daytime a breeze, as our 3 year old can do it himself. Then at night, do his teeth ourselves. It's come in very handy!

title: PerioSciences White Care Oral Care Kit - Toothpaste, Mouthwash, Gel
features: For your oral health -​​ PerioSciences Whitening Oral Care System is a three-product system for daily use by individuals who undergo peroxide-based professional whitening or strips. The product trio can make teeth even brighter, soothe soft tissue, and restore pH balance in the mouth.

Natural ingredients - This dental care kit is made using our signature antioxidants and botanicals such as Phloretin, perilla seed extract, and hesperetin. The whitening toothpaste contains plasdone along with grapefruit seed extracts and micro-minerals to gently polish and thoroughly cleanse surface stains while removing unhealthy build-up.

Dentist recommended - PerioSciences has worked with dentists for over 10 years to perfect our formula containing scientifically proven ingredients that focus on the mouth's natural defense system. Our products are recommended and used by over 1000 dentists nationwide.

Easy to use - Brush teeth with AO ProToothpaste. Rinse with 1 tsp of AO ProRinse for up to 1 minute then spit out. Apply a pea-sized amount of AO ProVantage Gel to gums using a fingertip or cotton swab, let gel dissolve, then spit out. Do not eat or drink for 30 minutes after application.

Redefining Oral Care with Antioxidants - PerioSciences believes in harnessing the power of nature using antioxidants and science in a novel dual approach by using ingredients known to have properties that keep your oral health and your smile at its best.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.text: This product works well. Although pricey, so worth it to save your teeth.

reviews.title: It is recommended by my dentist!
reviews.text: Use it daily and keeps my oral implants clean and healthy!

reviews.title: cleans my teeth well
reviews.text: Love this set, it cleans and freshens my breath.  My teeth feel cleaner longer than with regular toothpaste.  My breath stays fresh all day.  the mouthwash does not burn and the paste is gel like and it does not taste good or bad.

reviews.title: Synergistic formulation
reviews.text:
Excellent at controlling bad breath.
Especially for those of us who have a dry mouth, be it through illness or medications, I can tell you that this product is excellent and that area.
I used it during a time when I also had some mouth irritation. I feel that it helped to heal without any sting.

reviews.title: great set of premium oral care products
reviews.text: It seems like a lot of oral care companies are now going more high end, as I am starting to see toothpaste for over $10 when you can get "normal" toothpaste at the drugstore for $1-$2 (with a coupon). I was drawn to this because it is fluoride free. The toothpaste is nice and minty fresh, my mouth felt clean and fresh afterwards. I know that the brownish colored toothpaste may bother some people but I have used herbal toothpaste before so no color is "weird" or off limits for me - as long as they taste fine. There's even a few brands out there that has black colored paste! I really like the mouthwash as well and I'm surprised it is alcohol free because I feel like it does as good of a job as an alcohol one that I just recently purchased - minus the burn. My mouth just smelled and felt amazing after using both. I wasn't as fond of the dental gel as I found it useless and not something I would want to use much of. Overall this is a very nice set of oral care products and I would highly recommend the toothpaste and the mouth wash. I personally would repurchase the toothpaste and mouthwash - I hope they have a set with just those two items.

title: Extra Soft Toddler Toothbrush & Training Toothpaste Combo Pack Tom's Of Maine 1.75 oz Pack
description: The toothpaste included here is a clear gel that gently cleans their little teeth and gums without artificial flavors, colors or preservatives. It has great-tasting, mild fruit flavor that toddlers will love brushing with again and again. The extra soft toothbrush is the perfect size for the littlest brushers with a simple design to clean away plaque and food! The handle is 99% and bristles over 60% made from renewable castor plants. It's made from BPA-free #7 plastic with bristles that are dye-free and a handle colored with mineral based pigments.
features: Tom's Of Maine

reviews.title: Best basic toothbrush, hands down.

The smaller head size is perfect for getting the hard-to-reach back of the molars, and the super soft bristles are great if you have any issues with gun recession. Here's hoping Sensodyne recognizes that Americans would buy these again if they sold them here.

reviews.title: My Favorite Toothbrush

title: Violife VS2T705 Slim Sonic Toothbrush, Garnet Shimmer

It's sleek, compact and truly portable with a snap on vented mascara style cap keeping your toothbrush clean and dry. Bring the slim sonic toothbrush everywhere, at 6.5 inch high and 2 ounce it will fit in your purse, cosmetic case, backpack or briefcase for a healthy, sexy smile anywhere anytime.

reviews.title: Lacks power
reviews.text:
China makes some good products. This isn't one of them. How they got away from calling it a "Sonic Toothbrush" is a crime.
Phillips Sonicare mades a great electric toothbrush. Violive is less effective than manual brushing by far. Don't waste your $$$.

reviews.title: Five Stars

reviews.title: Compact
reviews.text: Wish there were different settings but it works great and does what it is-a toothbrush. Perfect for traveling with. Hope the battery life is good!

description: Ooak 4 pack Standard V++ Max Light - Multiple ColorsTapered V++Max bristles offer a unique design that simultaneously cleans teeth and removes plaque along the gum line. Reduces plaque and cleans the gum line
Tapered bristles

reviews.title: Huge Brush Head, Might Take Some Getting Used To.
reviews.text: I got these in the mail today and am mixed on them.  For one, I was instructed to do more brushing along the gum line for gum health, so these seem perfect.  I also really like that they are super soft bristles and are pretty gentle on that gum line, however, the brush head is huge and takes a little getting used to.  I have a big mouth and kind of wonder how this would work on a child or petit adult.  I was very happy with the brushing I got and I think I will be using these brushes exclusively in the coming months and will see how they went, once the coronavirus lockdown is over and dentists are back to work.

reviews.title: Very cute
reviews.text:
These were very cute!

I was pleased with these toothbrushes. I think they did a good job at getting my daughter's teeth cleaned. They felt good in her mouth. I thought they worked well.

I have been happy with this brand. We have bought dental products for a long time. They were easy to use. Teeth felt good after it. They last a while. They are a quality product. I would recommend it.

reviews.title: Will Take Getting Used To...
reviews.text: I was interested in trying out these toothbrushes, which I've had recommended to me by a couple of friends.  They're definitely weird in the beginning.  When you're used to a bit of coverage as you brush, having the thin strip down the middle and then on either side is a little odd.  I kept feeling like I had to rotate the brush more, which. might be a good thing?  It seems to clean as well as my normal toothbrush, but it is going to take time to be comfortable with.

reviews.title: Great beginner toothbrush
reviews.text: Great beginner toothbrush! The bristles are really soft so great for someone just getting started. I used one in my almost 5 yr old and the other on my almost 2 year old. Both worked great and were soft enough for them.

reviews.title: Super soft!
reviews.text: I have a niece that hates brushing, and doing so is a pain. The design of this is unique. It has a V shaped head to reach the teeth and gums at the same time. Comes in a pack of 2 so the two will last six months. Has a wider handles for little hands.

title: grabease Double-Sided Toothbrush for Ages 6 Months to 4 Years, Soft Bristles & Choke Protection Shield, BPA-Free, 1 Pack, Yellow
features: INDEPENDENT TOOTHBRUSHING: Introducing our game-changing toothbrush designed for independent toothbrushing in babies, toddlers, and preschool kids aged 6 months to 4 years! With its two-sided design, this toothbrush encourages a positive approach to oral hygiene. The pack includes one double-sided toothbrush that's perfect for little hands, and a silicone finger brush for gentle gum massage. This toddler toothbrush is ideal for a child's first toothbrush, making dental care fun and easy.

DOUBLE-SIDED TOOTHBRUSH: Our toothbrush is designed to give your child a dazzling smile in no time! The innovative, tapered bristles on both sides of this brush offer maximum contact with teeth - perfect for easily-distracted little ones. Plus, a bonus finger toothbrush is included, ideal for infants, and kids experiencing sensory or sensitivity issues. Ensure your child's dental care starts off strong with our versatile brush set.

SOFT BRISTLES & CHOKE PROTECTION: Our patented design ensures a safe, mess-free tooth cleaning experience for both toddlers and parents. With a built-in choke barrier, the Brush prevents over-insertion and gagging. The soft, flexible bristles are gentle on tender gums and new baby teeth. This versatile toothbrush is a must-have for your baby's first dental care kit - perfect for toddlers, first-time brushers, and those transitioning from finger toothbrushes.

EXPERT APPROVED: Specially designed for infants and toddlers, our patented toothbrush has the seal of approval from top pediatric dentists. With endorsements from the American Academy of Pediatric Dentistry, you can trust that our product is perfect for your child's needs. Remember to replace every 3-4 months for optimal oral hygiene. Shop with confidence, as our brushes ensure a safe, effective start to your baby's dental journey. Order spares or stock up now!

CERTIFIED SAFE: Meticulously lab-tested to meet the most stringent USA safety standards for your baby's wellbeing. Our toothbrushes are 100% BPA, lead, and phthalate-free, ensuring your child's safety as they learn proper oral hygiene. Guide your child with our double-sided toothbrush designed specifically for their needs - from their first tooth to confident self-brushing as a toddler. Create healthy habits under your loving supervision with Grabease.

reviews.title: Not a primary toothbrush
reviews.text: It’s hard-to-impossible to clean the front of my 18 month olds teeth with this. It’s too big. I can use a different brush for that, and then give this to him to “play with” for a few minutes. He makes gagging sounds but it is safe, of course; it’s just much bigger than other baby brushes. I’d save for older toddlers and even then it might be hard for fronts of teeth.

reviews.title: Cheaply made
reviews.text: Liked it but bristles got kind of funky quickly..

reviews.title: Great
reviews.text: Great baby’s first toothbrush

reviews.title: So far so good.
reviews.text: baby likes this, but i feel that it's a little bit on the shorter side. It does get the job done: cleaning teeth!

reviews.title: like, but its not love
reviews.text:
we've been using this for about a few weeks and it looks like we've had it for a year- its frayed pretty bad :(
**update- we trashed it and bought the cheaper ones. its not worth the price if its only going to last 2 weeks.
